TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonToggleButton implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示功能区上的一个切换按钮控件。

span.span: Represents a toggle button control on a Ribbon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以用于显示项是否处于选定状态。A can be used to show whether an item is selected. 你可以创建通过使用在运行时方法对象。You can create a at run time by using the method of the object. 可通过两种方法来访问 对象：There are two ways to access the object: - 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class. 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class. - 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method. 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class. [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否按下了切换按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the toggle button is pressed or not pressed.

value.span: 如果按下了切换按钮，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the toggle button is pressed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以在运行时更改。The property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 当用户单击 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击控件，属性更改之前引发事件。When the user clicks the control, the property changes before the event is raised.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the control.
A Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize that represents the size of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果按钮是菜单的一部分，则此属性无效。This property has no effect if the button is part of a menu. `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize`出现在菜单的按钮始终设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`。The `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize` of a button that appears on a menu is always set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`. 若要更改的大小在菜单上，使用属性。To change the size of a on a menu, use the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置菜单中此 控件上显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears on this control in a menu.

value.span: 一个 ，表示控件上的文本。

span.span: A that represents the text on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时，会出现嵌套在另一个菜单，和父菜单的属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。The appears when is nested in another menu, and the property of the parent menu is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 如果设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`，说明未显示。If the is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`, the description does not appear. 可以在运行时更改此属性。This property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置控件上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on the control.
An that is displayed on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的图像格式是 PNG，因为 PNG 格式的图像支持通过其 alpha 通道的透明度。The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel. 属性标识由控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时中更新此属性，将更新控件的外观，以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 如果设置属性，和属性会被忽略。If the property is set, the and properties are ignored. 尽管属性提供更好地控制比其他两个属性，因为每次对控件进行更新时，图像对象被发送到 Office 应用程序会比较慢。Although the property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated. 属性必须为`true`要显示图像的控件。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 当你将设置属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置属性`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果你设置属性在运行时，你必须设置属性`true`在代码中。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个名称，该名称可用于在 事件处理程序中标识控件图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that you can use in the event handler to identify an image for the control.

value.span: 一个字符串，可用于在 事件处理程序中标识控件图像。

span.span: A string that you can use in the event handler to identify an image for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识由控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. Office 应用程序检索此映像从你的解决方案一次，以提高性能。The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance. 此属性可以设置仅在设计时，因为它标识的图像加载期间事件。This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the event. 时将引发一次每个映像名称将显示功能区。 is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed. 之后，无法使用此属性更改控件图像。After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property. 若要加载的映像，将代码添加到事件处理程序。To load the image, add code to the event handler. 检查属性并设置属性到想要加载的映像的对象。Check the property of the and set the property of the object to the image that you want to load. 如果忽略此属性属性或属性设置。This property is ignored if either the property or the property is set. 标识的图像属性可以由标识的图像以外会稍微快一些加载显示属性，因为 Office 应用程序将检索映像你解决方案仅在首次从功能区。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed. 属性必须为`true`要显示图像的控件。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 当你将设置属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置属性`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果你设置属性在运行时，你必须设置属性`true`在代码中。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code. ## Examples 下面的示例将缓存两个按钮的的图像。The following example caches the images for two buttons. 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项到 Office 项目。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 将两个按钮添加到组。Add two buttons to the group. 4. 将两个映像添加到的项目资源。Add two images to the project resources. 然后可以在生成的功能区类中运行此代码。You can then run this code in the generated Ribbon class. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#6](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/CS/Ribbon1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#6](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/VB/Ribbon1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置切换按钮的键盘快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut of the toggle button.

value.span: 此 当前的键盘快捷键。

span.span: The current keyboard shortcut of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快捷键提示必须包含 1 到 3 个字符，并且必须包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. 键提示有时也称为访问密钥或快捷键，可用作激活控件的快捷组合键。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 当你按下 ALT 键时，键提示将显示在功能区上。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. 如果内置控件或从其他加载项，则与键提示中你快捷键提示相冲突，Microsoft Office 可能自动分配不冲突快捷键提示值。If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用键盘来使用功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523). 可以在运行时更改此属性。This property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置切换按钮上的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text on the toggle button.

value.span: 在此 控件上显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears on this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在运行时更改此属性。This property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 如果要使用内置 Microsoft Office 图标，请获取或设置要在 上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display on the , if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.

value.span: 作为此控件图标的内置 Microsoft Office 图标的 ID。

span.span: The ID of a built-in Microsoft Office icon that serves as the icon for this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识由控件显示 Office 图标。The property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control. 属性值是一个字符串，标识`imageMso`所选图标的值。The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon. 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时中更新此属性，将更新控件的外观，以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 有关的列表`imageMso`值，请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页面[2010 Office 系统外接程序： 图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [2010 Office System Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760). 如果忽略此属性属性设置。This property is ignored if the property is set. 标识的图像属性可以由标识的图像以外会稍微快一些加载属性，因为这些图像缓存在 Office 应用程序。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the images are cached in the Office application. 属性必须为`true`要显示图像的控件。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 当你将设置属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置属性`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果你设置属性在运行时，你必须设置属性`true`在代码中。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code. ## Examples 下面的示例将 Microsoft Office 图标分配到的菜单。The following example assigns a Microsoft Office icon to a menu. 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项到 Office 项目。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 向组添加切换按钮。Add a toggle button to the group. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#8](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#8](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#8)]

summary.span: 如果控件位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上，请获取或设置 的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the , if the control is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

value.span: 一个 ，表示 的位置（如果该控件位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

span.span: A that represents the position of the , if the control is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你无法使用此属性将设置的位置组中的控件。You cannot use this property to set the position of a control within a group. 若要排列按钮，将它们拖到中的正确位置**功能区设计器**。To arrange buttons, drag them to the correct positions in the **Ribbon Designer**. 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置当用户将指针移到切换按钮上方时显示的提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the toggle button.

value.span: 当用户将指针移到切换按钮上方时显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the toggle button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值必须少于 1024年个字符的长度。The value must be less than 1024 characters in length. 当设置属性，值将显示的标题为。When the property is set, the value appears as the title of the . 此属性可以在设计时更改和运行时。This property can be changed at design time and run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与 关联的图像是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the image that is associated with the is visible.

value.span: 如果与 关联的图像可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the image that is associated with the is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性自动设置为`true`如果你设置， ，或设计器中的属性。This property is automatically set to `true` if you set the , , or property in the designer. 此属性始终是`true`如果你设置属性`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。This property is always `true` if you set the property to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 可以在运行时更改此属性。This property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 的标签是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the label for the is visible.

value.span: 如果 的标签可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the label for the is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性始终是`true`如果你设置属性`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。This property is always `true` if you set the property to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 可以在运行时更改此属性。This property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到 控件上方时显示的多行提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the control.

value.span: 包含多行提示文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains multiline tip text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串必须是长度小于 1024年个字符。The string must be less than 1024 characters in length. 下显示文本。The appears under text. 与不同、字符串中的启用分行符。Unlike the , the enables line breaks in the string. 你可以更改在设计时和在运行时。You can change the at design time and at run time.
